cast.name: 玛丽亚·罗曼诺娃 Mariya Romanova
维多利亚·托卡列娃 Viktoriya Tokareva
尤利娅·布鲁亚基纳 Yuliya Bruyakina
达丽娅·库卡尔斯基 Darya Kukarskikh
娜塔莉亚·阿斯卡罗娃 Nataliya Askarova

director.name: 安德烈·西蒙诺夫 Andrey Simonov

introduction: Journalism student Danil volunteers to go to the SVO area, tired of the capital's hypocrisy. He is from Sevastopol himself, and knows a little more about the neighboring state than his friends. His anti-war girlfriend, Alisa, realizing that she is expecting a child, decides to save her young man from a fatal mistake and goes after him to bring him back. Finding a loved one in the chaos of war is not easy. In a few weeks spent in the hell of the assault on Mariupol, the guys will understand that the world lives not only within the framework of their ideas, and their love will be tested for strength.
